title: Here is a list of 20 articles up to 2021 that cover various aspects of data crowdsourcing and benchmark data collection
**"The Wisdom of Crowds"** by James Surowiecki
- While not an article, this book is foundational in understanding the principles behind crowdsourcing
**"Crowdsourcing Systems on the World-Wide Web"** by Aniket Kittur
- A comprehensive overview of crowdsourcing systems
**"Crowdsourcing: A Taxonomy and Description"**
- Provides a taxonomy of crowdsourcing and its various applications
**"Crowdsourcing User Studies with Mechanical Turk"**
- Discusses the use of Amazon Mechanical Turk for user studies
- Explores the future directions and implications of crowd work
**"Crowdsourcing and Human Computation: A Survey"** by Yiling Chen
- A survey of the field of crowdsourcing and human computation
**"Crowdsourcing for Social Innovation"** by
- Discusses how crowdsourcing can be used for social innovation
**"Crowdsourcing Ground Truth for Medical Relation Extraction"** by Jiaping Zheng et al
- Focuses on using crowdsourcing for medical data annotation
**"Crowdsourcing for Usability Testing"** by Jeff Sauro
- Discusses the use of crowdsourcing for usability testing
**"Crowdsourcing for Machine Learning: A Study of Data Collection for Image Classification"** by Pietro Perona and Serge Belongie
- Examines the use of crowdsourcing for collecting data for machine learning
**"Crowdsourcing for Speech Processing: Applications to Data Collection, Transcription and Assessment"** by Maxine Eskenazi et al
note: - Focuses on crowdsourcing applications in speech processing.

title: **"Crowdsourcing for Cognitive Science: The Utility of Smartphones"** by
- Discusses the use of crowdsourcing in cognitive science research
**"Crowdsourcing for Data Collection in Disaster and Crisis Management"** by Kate Starbird and Leysia Palen
- Explores the use of crowdsourcing in disaster management
**"Crowdsourcing for Data Collection in Environmental Research"** by Jennifer Preece
- Discusses the use of crowdsourcing in environmental research
**"Crowdsourcing for Data Collection in the Humanities"** by Mia Ridge
note: - Focuses on the use of crowdsourcing in humanities research.

title: **"Crowdsourcing for Data Collection in the Social Sciences"** by
- Examines the use of crowdsourcing in social science research
**"Crowdsourcing for Data Collection in the Life Sciences"** by Andrew Su et al
- Discusses the use of crowdsourcing in life sciences research
**"Crowdsourcing for Data Collection in the Physical Sciences"** by Chris Lintott et al
note: - Focuses on the use of crowdsourcing in physical sciences research.

title: **"Crowdsourcing for Data Collection in the Arts"** by Mia Ridge
- Discusses the use of crowdsourcing in the arts
**"Crowdsourcing for Data Collection in Education"** by Elizabeth Gerber and Darren Gergle
- Examines the use of crowdsourcing in educational research
These articles and books provide a broad overview of the various applications and methodologies of crowdsourcing and benchmark data collection across different fields
